channel.title: Connect Your Tools on DefectDojo Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in Connect Your Tools on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Universal Importer / Dojo-CLI
item.description: About Universal Importer Universal Importer and Dojo-CLI are command-line tools designed to seamlessly upload scan results into DefectDojo. It streamlines both the import and re-import processes of findings and associated objects.

item.title: Import Methods
item.description: One of the things we understand at DefectDojo is that every company’s security needs are completely different. There is no ‘one-size-fits-all’ approach.
